job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job SummarybrbrQuality Platform supports a premium streaming service offering live and ondemand TV and movies with and without commercials both in and outside the home Operating at the intersection of entertainment and technology Quality Platform consists of people who are passionate about redefining TV through innovation unconventional thinking and embracing fun As a team we are able to touch a wide stack of technologies and come up with many tooling solutions to many of the problems the Quality organization might face By doing so you will never be bored and siloed into one project where you have the ability to move to other projects and increase your skillset on all sorts of different projectsbrbrResponsibilitiesbrbrulliDesign architect and implement across services and clients for large scope testing frameworksliliOwnership of daily engineering work ideate review design build codereview test launchliliMonitor and maintainliliActively mentor other engineersliliTreat quality as a habit and enforce software engineering best practices and appropriate design patternsbrbrliulstrongBasic Qualificationsbrbrstrongulli2 year of relevant software engineering experienceliliProficiency in Java or PythonliliExperience using Automation Testing Framework such as Selenium Appium etcliliDoes extremely well with communication mentorship and collaboration skillsliliStrong teamwork ethic and strive for perfectionbrbrliulPreferred Qualificationsbrbrulli5 years of relevant software engineering experience or software automation experienceliliProficient in cloud infrastructure such as AWS Spinnaker or Jenkins and KubernetesliliStrong system design and analytical skillsliliCICD experienceknowledgebrbrliulstronguPreferred EducationbrbrustrongBachelors in Computer Science Computer Engineering Management Information Systems or related fieldbrbr869664BR
